name: The Portal Campaign
description: "The Portal Campaign" is a 2D pixelated video game with a simple top-down view that offers players a chance to engage in some action and adventure gameplay. With just a few levels and bosses to defeat, players will have a brief but enjoyable experience, battling enemies and overcoming obstacles. Please note that while we are working hard to improve the game, it is still in development and won't be a professionally-made game as it is just a project for three high school students to gain more experience in game development. #action #adventure THE GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND WE STILL HAVE A LOT TO DO BEFORE COMPLETING IT!
